skillTree.localised_description: The Black Mask was not only hired to assassinate foes of Skyre, but also to ensure the continued survival of its Chief Warlock.

effects.description:
No upkeep for the Black Mask
	(Hero's army)
Enables passive ability "Friend in the Shadows"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -20% for all actions

skillTree.localised_description: The Mask has been tasked with training the new-furs in the ways of Eshin. Only the most fierce-loyal shall be accepted!

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: +2% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Missile Strength: +6 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: +4% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Missile Strength: +12 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +9 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: +8% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Missile Strength: +16 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Those of Eshin knowledgeable in the Cathayan art of war are few and far between, using their learned secrets to advance their brood’s malevolence.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +40
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Make no mistake – in most cases, a Master Assassin’s training is quite literally a baptism of fire.
By its very nature, being good at killing requires that you are equally adept at not dying.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the merest scratch caused by a blade edged with Manbane causes death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

skillTree.localised_description: This poison contains a powerful narcotic that drives its victims to delusional insanity.
Like most other skilled assassins of Eshin, the Black Mask will eagerly sell his services to any who can further his own and his clan’s interests.
Few receive the honour of being trained by the Deathmaster himself; even fewer survive the trial.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +5% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Recruit rank: +4 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those unfortunate enough to be marked by Eshin are guaranteed a slow and painful death, as tides of eager assassins descend upon them to claim the bounty.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: “Strike from shadows quick-fast and run-run!”

related_attributes.bullet_text: If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: The Black Mask has aided in eliminating the enemies of Skrye. The Mask’s services have been worth every warpstone.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)
Secures a Defensive Alliance with Clan Eshin

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Such champions are adept at delivering a Killing Blow, depriving the foe of life with a single, powerful attack.

attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
"Kill-Surprise!"
The dark of night allows for one to isolate one’s prey, leaving them helpless in the face of a sinister plan.

effects.description:
Leadership: -5 for enemy Lords and embedded Heroes
	(enemy armies in local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Cheap attacks and cowardly tactics: the bread and butter of any sensible Skaven.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

skillTree.localised_description: When a bomb is smashed, a dark smoke curls out, concealing those who wish to hide and choking everyone else.

effects.description:
Ability: "Concealment Bombs" for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Beware the concealed weaponry of those trained in the art of delivering death from the shadows…

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A curious combination of far east invention and Skryre ingenuity, the Cracklebomb contains staggering explosive power in a small package.

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.
Having to hide, for an extended period, in a dark, dank recess, in order to entrap and kill your target encourages lateral thinking.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +3% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +7% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +6% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +9% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Early years spent in the gutter both prepares the ambitious rat for power and schools him in the dirtier, more cut-throat ways of war.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Gutter Runners, Night Runners, Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +20% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Range: +15% for Gutter Runners and Night Runners units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can fire while on the move.

items.colour_text: These twin daggers, balmed with some of the deadliest poisons in the Old World, ensure that any who suffer its blow would succumb to a brutal and excruciating demise.

This seal was stamped by the Grand Nightlord Sneek himself on a pledge to send a contingent of Eshin’s best assassins to aid Skavenblight should the need arise. Of course, this is just another scheme by Sneek to further his own power in the Council of Thirteen.

effects.description:
Recruitment Cost: -25% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

items.colour_text: Though the rags covering the Mask’s head are not special or unique, their effect on the enemy is where their value is found.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Though not as renowned or skilled as other assassins in the Clan, the Black Mask is, nonetheless, a fierce warrior and expert poison-brewer.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

Ammunition: +20 for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Night Runners, Gutter Runners, Death Runners & Eshin Triads
	(Hero's army)
